alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 20 at 3:23AM MST until December 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 50 MPH with gusts up to 75 MPH possible. * WHERE...Central and Southern Laramie Range, Adjacent Foothills, and lower elevations of Platte County. This includes Interstate 25 between Glendo and Cheyenne. * WHEN...8 PM MST this evening until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills
